meanings.definition: The act of wearing a corset to shape the body.
meanings.sent1: Her corseting helped her achieve an hourglass figure.
meanings.sent2: I noticed her corseting under the elegant gown.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her corseting made her feel like a Victorian lady.
meanings.sent4: The corseting of her waist was like sculpting a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The art of corseting transformed her silhouette completely.

meanings.definition: The process of tightening or lacing a corset.
meanings.sent1: The corseting of the dress required delicate hands.
meanings.sent2: She was skilled in the art of corseting her garments.
meanings.sent3: His clumsy corseting left the dress lopsided.
meanings.sent4: The corseting of the fabric resembled intricate weaving.
meanings.sent5: The gentle corseting of the strings created a perfect fit.

meanings.definition: The practice of using a corset for support or fashion purposes.
meanings.sent1: Her corseting provided both elegance and comfort.
meanings.sent2: The history of corseting dates back centuries.
meanings.sent3: The modern corseting trend revived old-fashioned charm.
meanings.sent4: The corseting of the outfit added a touch of sophistication.
meanings.sent5: She embraced the traditional art of corseting in her wardrobe.
